outline:
1. to tread down, reject, trample down
    1. (Qal)
      1. to tread down, trample (of warriors)
      2. of rejection (fig.)
    2. (Polel)
      1. to tread down (in bad sense)
      2. to desecrate
    3. (Hithpolel)
      1. to tread
      2. to kick out
        1. of infants' blind movements
        2. of Jerusalem (fig.)
      3. (Hophal) to be trodden down
